name: Ninja Grove
description:
Run through the forest, and take down enemies to save your master!

Ninja Grove is a sidescrolling infinite runner. Run through three unique levels and try to best your score. Defeat enemies along the way to collect coins and use them to unlock new levels, weapons, and skins. Defeat the dragon at the end of level 3 to save your master and unlock secret items.

This project is completed and can be found on the Google Play Store (iOS coming soon)
